title: Corner the Market
condition: Control 4 planets that each have the same planet trait.

title: Develop Weaponry
condition: Own 2 unit upgrade technologies.

title: Diversify Research
condition: Own 2 technologies in each of 2 colors.

title: Erect a Monument
condition: Spend 8 resources.

title: Expand Borders
condition: Control 6 planets in non-home systems.

title: Found Research Outposts
condition: Control 3 planets that have technology specialties.

title: Intimidate Council
condition: Have 1 or more ships in 2 systems that are adjacent to Mecatol Rex's System.

title: Lead From the Front
condition: Spend a total of 3 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools.

title: Negotiate Trade Routes
condition: Spend 5 trade goods.

title: Sway the Council
condition: Spend 8 influence.

title: Amass Wealth
condition: Spend 3 influence, 3 resources and 3 trade goods.

title: Build Defenses
condition: Have 4 or more structures (on the game board).

title: Discover Lost Outposts
condition: Control 2 planets that have attachments.

title: Engineer a Marvel
condition: Have your flagship or a war sun on the game board.

title: Explore Deep Space
condition: Have units in 3 systems that do not contain planets.

title: Improve Infrastructure
condition: Have structures on 3 planets outside of your home system.

title: Make History
condition: Have units in 2 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex or anomalies.

title: Populate the Outer Rim
condition: Have units in 3 systems on the edge of the game board (other than your home system).

title: Push Boundaries
condition: Control more planets than each of 2 of your neighbors.

title: Raise a Fleet
condition: Have 5 or more non-fighter ships in one system.

title: Centralize Galactic Trade
condition: Spend 10 trade goods.

title: Conquer the Weak
condition: Control 1 planet that is in another player's home system.

title: Form Galactic Brain Trust
condition: Control 5 planets that have technology specialties.

title: Found a Golden Age
condition: Spend 16 resources.

title: Galvanize the People
condition: Spend a total of 6 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools.

title: Manipulate Galactic Law
condition: Spend 16 influence.

title: Master the Sciences
condition: Own 2 technologies in each of 4 colors.

title: Revolutionize Warfare
condition: Own 3 unit upgrade technologies.

title: Subdue the Galaxy
condition: Control 11 planets in non-home systems.

title: Unify the Colonies
condition: Control 6 planets that each have the same planet trait.

title: Achieve Supremacy
condition: Have your flagship or a war sun in another player's home system or the Mecatol Rex system.

title: Become a Legend
condition: Have units in 4 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or anomalies.

title: Command an Armada
condition: Have 8 or more non-fighter ships in 1 system.

title: Construct Massive Cities
condition: Have 7 or more structures (on the game board).

title: Control the Borderlands
condition: Have units in 5 systems on the edge of the game board (other than your home system).

title: Hold Vast Reserves
condition: Spend 6 influence, 6 resources and 6 trade goods.

title: Patrol Vast Territories
condition: Have units in 5 systems that do not contain planets.

title: Protect the Border
condition: Have structures on 5 planets outside of your home system.

title: Reclaim Ancient Monuments
condition: Control 3 planets that have attachments.

title: Rule Distant Lands
condition: Control 2 planets that are each in or adjacent to a different, other player's home system.

title: Destroy Their Greatest Ship
condition: Destroy another player's war sun or flagship.

title: Make an Example of Their World
condition: Use BOMBARDMENT to destroy the last of a player's ground forces on a planet.

title: Spark a Rebellion
condition: Win a combat against a player who has the most victory points.

title: Turn Their Fleets to Dust
condition: Use SPACE CANNON to destroy the last of a player's ships in a system.

title: Unveil Flagship
condition: Win a space combat in a system that contains your flagship. You cannot score this objective if your flagship is destroyed in the combat.

title: Become a Martyr
condition: Lose control of a planet in a home system.

title: Betray a Friend
condition: Win a combat against a player whose promissory note you had in your play area at the start of your tactical action.

title: Brave the Void
condition: Win a combat in an anomaly.

title: Darken the Skies
condition: Win a combat in another player's home system.

title: Demonstrate Your Power
condition: Have 3 or more non-fighter ships in the active system at the end of a space combat.

title: Fight With Precision
condition: Use ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE to destroy the last of a player's fighters in a system.

title: Prove Endurance
condition: Be the last player to pass during a game round.

title: Adapt New Strategies
condition: Own 2 faction technologies. (Valefar Assimilator technologies do not count toward this objective).

title: Become the Gatekeeper
condition: Have 1 or more ships in a system that contains an alpha wormhole and 1 or more ships in a system that contains a beta wormhole.

title: Control the Region
condition: Have 1 or more ships in 6 systems.

title: Cut Supply Lines
condition: Have 1 or more ships in the same system as another player's space dock.

title: Establish a Perimeter
condition: Have 4 PDS units on the game board.

title: Forge an Alliance
condition: Control 4 cultural planets.

title: Form a Spy Network
condition: Discard 5 Action Cards.

title: Fuel the War Machine
condition: Have 3 space docks on the game board.

title: Gather a Mighty Fleet
condition: Have 5 dreadnoughts on the game board.

title: Learn the Secrets of the Cosmos
condition: Have 1 or more ships in 3 systems that are each adjacent to an anomaly.

title: Master the Laws of Physics
condition: Own 4 technologies of the same color.

title: Mine Rare Metals
condition: Control 4 hazardous planets.

title: Monopolize Production
condition: Control 4 industrial planets.

title: Occupy the Seat of the Empire
condition: Control Mecatol Rex and have 3 or more ships in its system.

title: Threaten Enemies
condition: Have 1 or more ships in a system that is adjacent to another player's home system.

title: Defy Space and Time
condition: Have units in the wormhole nexus.

title: Destroy Heretical Works
condition: Purge 2 of your relic fragments of any type.

title: Establish Hegemony
condition: Control planets that have a combined influence value of at least 12.

title: Foster Cohesion
condition: Be neighbors with all other players.

title: Hoard Raw Materials
condition: Control planets that have a combined resource value of at least 12.

title: Mechanize The Military
condition: Have 1 mech on each of 4 planets.

title: Occupy The Fringe
condition: Have 9 or more ground forces on a planet that does not contain 1 of your space docks.

title: Produce En Masse
condition: Have units with a combined PRODUCTION value of at least 8 in a single system.

title: Seize An Icon
condition: Control a legendary planet.

title: Stake your Claim
condition: Control a planet in a system that contains a planet controlled by another player.

title: Strengthen Bonds
condition: Have another player's promissory note in your play area.

title: Dictate Policy
condition: There are 3 or more laws in play.

title: Drive the Debate
condition: You or a planet you control are elected by an agenda.
